We build the barely possible to overcome the barely solvable.

First Mode helps companies, governments, and individuals tackle the problems that matter in the most extreme environments no matter what—or where—they might be.

Our people make the difference

The First Mode team thrives at the intersection of industry and technology. Every day, we create new approaches to unique problems through iterative analysis and boundless imagination.

First Mode people are entrepreneurial, visionary, and multi-faceted, and our teams bring their full selves to the table for a truly collaborative experience.
